title: Post-Storm Damage Assessment
description: After a major storm, the utility needs to assess the extent of the damage to the electric grid.

tasks.description: Dispatch damage assessment crews to patrol the hardest-hit circuits.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates and dispatches assessment work orders.

tasks.description: As assessors report damage (e.g., broken poles, downed wires), log the information in the OMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: System receives and logs damage reports, linking them to specific assets on the GIS map.

tasks.description: Aggregate the damage reports to create a comprehensive overview of the required repairs and estimate the total restoration time.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a summary report and a global ETR for the entire event.
